block.p: D'ADDARIO-John. On June 1, 2000 of West Hempstead, N.Y. Beloved husband of Mary. Loving father of John, Janet, Richard, James and the late Carmine. Cherished grandfather of 12 grandchildren and 4 great grandchildren. Dear brother of Lena and Clara. Visiting at the Fairchild Chapel, Franklin Ave. at 12th Street, Garden City 2-4 and 7-9 P.M. Sunday. Mass of Christian burial St. Thomas the Apostle Church, West Hempstead, N.Y. 11 A.M. Monday. Interment Holy Rood Cemetery, Westbury. In lieu of flowers donations to Mercy Hospice appreciated.
